## üõ°Ô∏è RISK MANAGEMENT FRAMEWORK

### Risk Register

| Risk | Probability | Impact | Severity | Mitigation | Owner |
|------|------------|--------|----------|-----------|-------|
| Merge Conflicts | 5% | Medium | Low | Code mapping pre-analysis | Tech Lead |
| Missing Dependencies | 3% | Low | Low | Archive reference + validation | Dev Lead |
| Performance Regression | 2% | Medium | Low | Parallel testing + optimization | Perf Lead |
| Timeline Slip | 10% | Medium | Medium | 48-hour buffer + daily tracking | PM |
| Data Loss | <1% | Critical | Critical | Archive backup + version control | Backup Lead |
| Team Unavailability | 5% | High | Medium | Backup team + flexible schedule | HR Lead |

### Contingency Plans

```
‚úÖ IF merge conflicts occur:
   ‚Üí Use pre-created consolidation mapping
   ‚Üí Manual resolution with code review
   ‚Üí Expected resolution: <15 min per conflict
   ‚Üí Escalate to tech lead if needed

‚úÖ IF performance degrades:
   ‚Üí Rollback to archive
   ‚Üí Optimize consolidation approach
   ‚Üí Run performance benchmark
   ‚Üí Expected recovery: <45 min

‚úÖ IF timeline slips:
   ‚Üí Activate 48-hour buffer (Dec 24-25)
   ‚Üí Extend to Dec 26-27 if needed
   ‚Üí Prioritize core deliverables
   ‚Üí Defer polish work if necessary

‚úÖ IF team member unavailable:
   ‚Üí Activate backup team member
   ‚Üí Redistribute tasks
   ‚Üí Update standup with new assignments
   ‚Üí Continue execution
```

## üìã DAILY STANDUP FORMAT

**Schedule:** Every day 9:00 AM +03  
**Duration:** 15 minutes  
**Attendees:** Project lead, tech lead, team representatives, support  

### Agenda Template
```
1. OPENING (2 min)
   - Current date & day count (e.g., Day 1 of 5)
   - Status summary (On track / Blocked / At Risk)
   - Confidence check

2. COMPLETED YESTERDAY (3 min)
   - What was finished
   - Number of workflows processed
   - Issues resolved

3. PLANNED TODAY (3 min)
   - What we're doing today
   - Expected completions
   - Risks identified

4. BLOCKERS (3 min)
   - Any issues blocking progress
   - Support needed
   - Escalations required

5. METRICS (2 min)
   - Progress vs plan
   - Quality metrics
   - Team health

6. CLOSING (2 min)
   - Confirmation: Ready for execution
   - Next standup: Tomorrow same time
   - Closing statement
```
